data.text: @CanBorder Clear the backlogs! It’s so unfair that you prioritize new visa applications over those who have been waiting since 2020!! It just doesn’t make sense
@CanBorder I used the ArriveCAN app back in Nov. Works great. Easy border cross. No questions by US  returning.

@CanBorder “And if you are a vaccinated Canadian that did your part for 2 years, we will still punish you by requiring a test, even if you cross for 2 hours because science says you can catch COVID in the US and test positive within 2 hours” @jyduclos @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @manvirshokar
@CanBorder for the country where Im going covid-negative tests and isolation is enough. no need to be fully-vaxxed to enter. whats your problem???? can you explain???? let me gooooo
@CanBorder how about boarding rules? why Im still caged? unvaccinated people can enter canada but cant leave?
@CanBorder @GovCanHealth Have you read about Pfizer side effects?  https://t.co/satfk9y997
@CanBorder @GovCanHealth Can we stop promoting the harmful vaccines that are ineffective. https://t.co/fwAyrUAUq3
@JavsMistula @CanBorder You don’t want the mRNA vaccines trust me. https://t.co/fwAyrUAUq3
